flash.tools.debugger

Interface ILauncher


  • public interface ILauncher
    A ILauncher which handles the launching of the URI or the command. ILauncher is to provide more flexibility to handle the Player launch in different platforms.
    Author:
    ugs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Process launch(String[] cmd)
      Launches the debug target.
      void terminate(Process process)
      Terminate the process started by launch method.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        Process launch(String[] cmd)
               throws IOException
        Launches the debug target.
        Parameters:
        cmd - - Launch URL and other arguments
        Returns:
        A handle to the process.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • terminate

        void terminate(Process process)
               throws IOException
        Terminate the process started by launch method.
        Parameters:
        process - - process started by launch.
        Throws:
        IOException
